text:
Figo GmbH - Hamburg, Germany - Full Time - Onsite - Software Engineer

We are a FinTech startup located in Hamburg. Our product is a banking REST API which enables our clients to provide banking functions to their customers.

At the moment we're looking for Python and Node.js developers to enhance our scalable system.

For more information you can take a look at the full job listings.

http://figo.io/pdf/Anzeige_Senior-Python.pdf

http://figo.io/pdf/Anzeige_Senior_NodeJs.pdf
